title: It's so easy. - [rev. ed.]
creator_credit: Donald Crombie, John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Demonstrates correct practices for safety in small boats. Illustrates common types of accidents and their prevention, maintenance, life jackets, safety harness and survival swimming.
